cyclone.name: MATTHEW
cyclone.current_location: about 275 mi (440 km) southwest of Port-au-Prince, Haiti
cyclone.trajectory: tracking north toward southwestern Haiti, eastern Cuba, and the Bahamas – remaining well west of Puerto Rico

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch for Dominican Republic from Puerto Plata westward to the Haiti border
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning for Jamaica, Haiti, eastern Cuba (Guantanamo through Las Tunas) and the southeastern Bahamas; Tropical Storm Warning for Dominican Republic from Barahona westward to the Haiti border
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Jamaica, Haiti, eastern Cuba, southeastern and central Bahamas, eventually the Florida peninsula
weather_observation.wind: Outer rainbands may bring brief gusts 20–30 mph, but sustained tropical-storm-force winds are unlikely.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected along the Puerto Rico coast from Matthew.
weather_observation.rainfall: Scattered outer-band showers could produce 1–2 inches of rain; localized higher amounts possible but widespread heavy rainfall not expected.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Rougher seas and dangerous rip currents along the south and west‐facing beaches of Puerto Rico.
